titleInfo.title: Bd. of Trustees, Sheet Metal Workers Local #112 et al v. Statewide Sheet Metal, LLC, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT : referring and transferring this action to the NDNY Bankruptcy Court for administration and disposition in conjunction with the Chapter 7 Bankruptcy case of Michael J. Casiuk, individually and as President of Statewide Sheetmetal, LLC (NDNY Bankruptcy case # 05-72866-6-sdg). (Issued by Deputy Clerk Joanne Bleskoski) {Certified copy sent to Bankruptcy Court} (jmb)
